item.title: Simple Task for New Freelancers to Try our Product! - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for advice from real customers to improve our product and service. Our products are crawl space vapor barriers. You need capture images and videos of our Amazon products with your mobile phone. No complete skills are required, simply take3-5shots with your phone, and shoot a short 30-135 seconds showcase.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:20 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Photo Editing, Amazon Product Research, Video Editing & Production, Review or Feedback Collection

item.title: Video Creation for T-Shirt Sales - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video creator to help me create engaging videos showcasing 4-5 t-shirts for my online store. The videos should be visually appealing and highlight the unique features of each t-shirt. The main goal is to increase sales and attract potential customers. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, graphic design, and content creation. Strong attention to detail and a creative mindset are essential. This is a great opportunity to work with a growing e-commerce business. If you have the skills and passion for creating compelling videos, apply now!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Illustration, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Illustration, Video Editing
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Videography & editing - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a Chicago-based individual who can help me plan and shoot a variety of content (all in one location) that will be the basis for a variety of social media ads/videos.

Beyond filming, candidates would ideally be available to help edit and create the content from the footage. While I have many video concepts in mind, I'd welcome input and perspectives. Experience with digital marketing a big plus.

See https://www.instagram.com/thedryerdrawer/ for product concept. All the collateral on the profile thus far has been self produced. Looking to make meaningful upgrade in quality, look, and style now that product is on market.

Hourly Range: $60.00-$120.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:10 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Product Photography, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Product Photography, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor & Researcher - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor & Researcher to create engaging and stylized video content for TikTok and Instagram. Your tasks will include researching and clipping relevant videos from sources like YouTube and editing them into compelling short-form content.

Responsibilities:

- Research and find relevant videos on specific subjects from YouTube and other sources.
- Clip and compile these videos into engaging content for TikTok and Instagram.
- Edit and produce high-quality, stylized video clips suitable for social media.
- Collaborate on content strategy to ensure alignment with our brand.

Requirements:

- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Strong research skills for finding and clipping relevant video content.
- Understanding of visual consistency and branding for social media.
- Ability to produce engaging and stylized video content for TikTok and Instagram.

Application Instructions:
Submit your portfolio along with the sample task. Highlight any relevant experience and provide examples of videos you have created before.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
